1: Guiding presence reveals itself again to faithful companions.
2: Community gathers, strengthening relationships and shared purpose.
3: Begin together promptly and pursue shared work.
4: At dawn, steadfast guidance stands ready on the shore.
5: Check needs kindly before offering practical support.
6: Act on specific guidance, and abundance follows.
7: Recognize truth and move swiftly toward it.
8: Cooperation brings a fruitful harvest within reach.
9: Warm fire and food await on arrival.
10: Share what you have just caught.

13: Share nourishing food generously with others
14: Repeated presence strengthens followers' trust and purpose.
15: Nurture those entrusted to you with love and guidance.
16: I lovingly nurture those entrusted to my care.
17: I nourish and guide those entrusted to my care.
18: Welcome caring guidance as you age and grow wiser.
19: I follow and honor the highest good.
20: Stay close in love and faithfully follow.
21: Focus on your calling and honor others' journeys.
22: I keep focused on my path and follow my calling.
23: I stay focused on my mission and follow faithfully.

25: Good actions overflow beyond all records
